World Behrman 1 km raster

Source: R/get_world_berhman_1km_rast.R
get_world_berhman_1km_rast.Rd

Import a terra::rast() template raster dataset delineating the global extent at 1 km resolution using the World Behrman coordinate reference system (ESRI:54017).

get_world_berhman_1km_rast()

Value

A terra::rast() object.

Details

This raster datast is intended to be used as a template for spatial data processing. As such, it does not contain any meaningful data. Specifically, all grid cells contain a value of 1.

Examples

# import data
x <- get_world_berhman_1km_rast()

# preview data
print(x)
#> class       : SpatRaster 
#> dimensions  : 14685, 34736, 1  (nrow, ncol, nlyr)
#> resolution  : 1000, 1000  (x, y)
#> extent      : -17367531, 17368469, -7342231, 7342769  (xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax)
#> coord. ref. : World_Behrmann 
#> source      : world_behrman_1km_rast.tif 
#> name        : lyr.1 
#> min value   :     1 
#> max value   :     1 

# plot data
plot(x)
